sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>This fix script will be used for following operations : - To migrate records from appsec_dashboard_event_logs to specific isc_events tables.</description> <name>Migrate ISC Events</name> <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[var job = new GlideRunScriptJob(); job.scheduleScript("new ISCEventsUtil().migrateDashEventLog()"); ]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2021-01-20 18:39:41</sys_created_on> <sys_id>a72e42020fb16010b25fea12ff767eff</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Migrate ISC Events</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Instance Security Center" source="com.glide.instance_sec_center">387a706c3cf1311068bcf327dfe37f96</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_a72e42020fb16010b25fea12ff767eff</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2021-03-08 18:22:01</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
